description: Department of Elections - Mr. T. Yokarajah has forfeited his rights to have his name retained in the nomination paper, for the filling any casual vacancy by reason of him ceasing to be a member of the party. Mr. Thawakrishnan, Mr. S. Nakalingam, Mr. S. Sivakumaran, Mr. S. Wasandalingam, Mr. S. Selvarasa -do-
